TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MSBuild extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.RunInMTA

summary.span: 執行 MSBuild 作業。

span.span: Implements the MSBuild task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 MSBuild 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the MSBuild element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [MSBuild 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [MSBuild Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作"MSBuild"工作中，遞交給 MSBuild 引擎要建置的子專案檔。This class implements the "MSBuild" task, which hands off child project files to the MSBuild engine to be built. 標示 RunInMTA，因為不 RequestBuilder 繁殖它們在執行緒上執行 MSBuild 工作，應該沒有理由。Marked RunInMTA because there is no reason MSBuild tasks should run on a thread other than that of the RequestBuilder which spawned them.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值指定 屬性中指定的專案是否會在可能的情況下同時建置。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the projects specified in the property are built in parallel, if possible.

value.span: 如果 屬性中指定的專案會在可能的情況下同時建置，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the projects specified in the property are built in parallel if possible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 工作是否一次一個叫用傳遞至 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 的清單每個目標，而不是同時叫用。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time, instead of at the same time.

value.span: 如果 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 工作一次一個叫用傳遞至 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 的清單每個目標，則為 ；如果 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 工作同時叫用清單中的所有目標，則為 。

span.span: if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time; if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes all targets in the list at the same time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`保證，即使先前叫用的目標失敗，會叫用後續的目標。Setting this property to `true` guarantees that subsequent targets are invoked even if previously invoked targets failed. 否則，建置錯誤便會停止叫用所有後續的目標。Otherwise, a build error would stop invocation of all subsequent targets. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

value.span: 如果會略過磁碟上不存在的專案檔，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if project files that do not exist on the disk will be skipped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果專案檔不存在於磁碟上不會略過，他們會造成建置錯誤。If project files that do not exist on the disk are not skipped, they will cause a build error.

Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.Output

summary.span: 傳回所有專案檔中建置目標的輸出。

span.span: Returns the outputs of the built targets from all the project files.

summary.span: 只會傳回所指定目標的輸出，而非可能存在於這些目標所依存的任何輸出。

span.span: Only the outputs from the targets that were specified are returned, not any outputs that may exist on targets that those targets depend on.

value.span: 所有專案檔中建置目標的輸出。

span.span: The outputs of the built targets from all the project files.

summary.span: 請使用分號分隔目標名稱清單。

span.span: Use a semicolon to separate a list of target names.

value.span: 要在專案檔中建置的一個或多個目標。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未在 `MSBuild` 工作中指定目標，即會建置專案檔中指定的預設目標。If no targets are specified in the `MSBuild` task, the default targets specified in the project files are built.

summary.span: 取得或設定建置專案時的目標 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本，可讓 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 工作建置專案時，將目標設為不同於專案中所指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本。

span.span: Gets or sets a target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version to build the project with, which enables an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task to build a project that targets a different version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] than the one specified in the project.

summary.span: 有效值為 、 及 。

span.span: Valid values are , and .

value.span: 建置專案時的目標 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本。

span.span: The target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version to build the project with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `3.5.`The default value is `3.5.`

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值表示 MSBuild 引擎是否會從快取區傳回已建置的目標。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 現金的建置目標的範圍是 (ProjectFileName，GlobalProperties) [targetnames 內] 做為組建項目清單。The scope of built targets in the cash is (ProjectFileName, GlobalProperties)[TargetNames] as a list of build items. 這個屬性不會再用於 4.0 版。This property is no longer used in version 4.0.
